# NSControl.ImagePosition.imageBelow

**Case**

The image is below the title.

## Declaration

```swift
case imageBelow
```

## Positioning a Control’s Image

- **NSControl.ImagePosition.noImage**: The cell doesn’t display an image.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageOnly**: The cell displays an image but not a title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageLeading**: The image is on the title’s leading edge.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageTrailing**: The image is on the title’s trailing edge.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageLeft**: The image is to the left of the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageRight**: The image is to the right of the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageAbove**: The image is above the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageOverlaps**: The image overlaps the title.
